settings.feature_description: With its comfortable and discreet design, you can wear SENSA without any inconvenience, and get on                     with your day-to-day activities without any interruptions.
settings.feature_item_1: Small and thin design - like a pack of playing cards (±75x61x14mm)

settings.benefits_title: Understand and take control of your bladder
settings.benefit_1_description: With Sensa, you can get to know your bladder better, and actively control to improve it
settings.benefit_2_description: Create automatic statistics of your voidings to understand your personal patterns.
settings.benefit_3_description: Sensa provides peace of mind and security, so you can go about your day with confidence.
settings.benefit_4_description: Get discreet vibrations when it's time to go to the bathroom, to ensure your privacy.
